code: import axios from"axios";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import logger from"./logService";axios.defaults.headers.common["x-auth-token"]=localStorage.token;axios.interceptors.response.use(null,function(error){var expectedError=error.response&&error.response.status>=400&&error.response.status<500;if(!expectedError){logger.log(error);toast("An unexpected error occurred");}return Promise.reject(error);});export default{get:axios.get,post:axios.post,delete:axios.delete};
